title: IPH 375 - Our children, Lord, in faith and prayer

lines: Our children, Lord, in faith and prayer
let them Your covenant mercies share
and save them by Your grace.
In early days their hearts secure
and let them to life’s end endure
We do not ask for wealth or fame
for them in this world’s strife;
we ask, in Your almighty Name:
Before them let their parents live
then, Lord, to heaven their souls receive

CCLI: Thomas Haweis, 1733–1820 and Thomas Hastings, 1784–1872, adapted Compilers of Praise! 2000 CCLI 128675
